title: [QUESTION] When text message are painted by SKPaint, the size of painted text are different on Windows and MacOS.
body:
Does SKPaint depend on the OS environment?
I've created images with a message by drawing SKPaint. But the size of text in the images are different.
I've confirmed the size by MeasureText() and both widths are heights are different.
In below images, left image is the output in windows and right image in macos.
![Screen Shot 2023-03-21 at 3 03 09 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45782815/226529620-75e9eb52-1baa-4b00-9856-d2409e6bee2a.png)

Is there any way to get images created with the same size letters?
